## Running octave from Rstudio cloud example. Requirements are installing octave in the machine [octave link](https://octave.org/download) and also installing the statistics package [how to install a package in ubuntu link](https://askubuntu.com/questions/936022/how-to-install-statistics-package-in-octave4-0-0-in-ubuntu-16-04)



```{octave test}
sample_n = 1000;
sample_n
```
